text: :Not to be confused with Kerckhoffs's principle. There are several Kirchhoff's laws, all named after Gustav Kirchhoff: * Kirchhoff's circuit laws (electrical circuits) * Kirchhoff's law of thermal radiation * Kirchhoff equations (fluid dynamics) * Kirchhoff's three laws of spectroscopy * Kirchhoff's law of thermochemistry
title: Kirchhoff's laws
